name: Forget Me Not 旧事如新
name_original: Forget Me Not 旧事如新
description:
======================================================

You are the little guy living in the mobile phone memory.

Loading data from storage and throw into the application.

Accompany with your old buddy, listen to his story, felling his love. 

Blossoming in the shades of summer, the old stories arrive. Forget me not they say, Forget me not they hold.

勿忘草会在某个夏天开出绚烂的花，摇曳的花影里，城南旧事，如约而至。

=====================================================

WSAD - Move

Mouse Left Button - Pick / Throw

Space - Jump

======================================================
